narratives.evidence_quote: इन वजहों से रूस पश्चिमी देशों के कई तरह के प्रतिबंध झेल रहा है, जिसमें आर्थिक प्रतिबंध भी शामिल हैं।
narratives.reasoning: The passage describes Russia as bearing sanctions imposed by Western countries, portraying Russia as suffering under external pressure.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Russia is the Victim: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: इन वजहों से रूस की हालत खस्ता हुई है, जबकि वह दुनिया का दूसरा शक्तिशाली देश माना जाता रहा है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The sentence directly frames Russia as being in a worsened condition due to external factors (sanctions from Western countries), which supports the parent narrative of Russia as a victim without mapping to the more specific subnarratives (West russophobia, self-defence, or UA extremists).
